Redmine Java API 1.10 released: going JSON

May 17, 2012 â€¢ Author: admin

We released Redmine Java API 1.10.0 today.
Significant changes:

    * Exception handling changes are not backward compatible. See https://github.com/taskadapter/redmine-java-api/wiki/Migration-Guide * The library is now using JSON instead of XML when communicating with Redmine. Castor XML library dependency is dropped.
Project website: https://github.com/taskadapter/redmine-java-api
